pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 22, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement about the future of the Canadian Coast Guard, and will hold a media availability. Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Jonathan Wilkinson, Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan, President of the Treasury Board and Minister of Digital Government Joyce Murray, Minister of Public Services and Procurement and Accessibility Carla Qualtrough, and Commissioner of the Canadian Coast Guard Jeffery Hutchinson, will be in attendance.

HMCS Discovery
1200 Stanley Park Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should present themselves to the security entrance off Stanley Park Drive no later than 8:30 a.m.
